description: Comprehensive test queries for all 8 intent functions

show_daily_sales.description: Show sales broken down by day for a date range
queries: show me daily sales for the last week
daily beer sales from May 1 to May 31, 2025
day by day sushi sales in July 2025
what were the top 10 items last month
show me the 5 best selling sushi items in June 2025
top 20 items in Q2 2025
best selling beer items this month

show_category_breakdown.description: Show sales broken down by category
queries: sales by category in July 2025
category breakdown for last quarter
which categories sold most in June 2025

get_total_sales.description: Get total sales for a period
queries: what were total sales in May 2025
how much revenue did we make last month
total sushi sales in July 2025
overall beer sales for Q2 2025

find_peak_day.description: Find the day with highest or lowest sales
queries: what was our best day in July 2025
worst sales day last month
highest sushi sales day in June 2025
slowest day for beer sales in May 2025

compare_day_types.description: Compare sales between different day types
queries: compare weekday vs weekend sales in July 2025
Fridays vs Saturdays in June 2025
weekday vs weekend sushi sales last month

track_item_performance.description: Track performance of a specific item over time
queries: how is Salmon Roll selling this month
track Spicy Tuna sales from May to July 2025
California Roll performance in June 2025
Edamame sales trend last quarter

compare_periods.description: Compare sales between two time periods (with optional item support)
queries: compare May and June 2025 sales
May vs June sushi sales
compare Q1 and Q2 2025
compare Salmon Roll sales May vs June 2025
how did Spicy Tuna perform April vs May 2025

metadata.purpose: Comprehensive testing of all intent functions with realistic user queries
